Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together, competing on the evening of Tuesday, October 22, during the Los Angeles Lakers's season opener.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James first spoke about his dream to play alongside Bronny a few years ago, while his oldest son was still in high school.
Post-Match Reflections: Miami forward Kevin Love said it was 'an unbelievable moment' to see father and son playing together.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James is the 39-year-old top scorer in NBA history, while LeBron James Jr. was a second-round pick by the Lakers last summer.
Others: The Lakers have declined to speculate on how long Bronny will stay on their NBA roster.
